Maybe off topic at this one...
While crawling a site, I want to apply a filter in the
WriterProcessor, so that it writes to ARC files only those files that have
'online_print.jsp' as their filename.
I know I have to apply a regExp such as
.*online_print\.jsp.*
and then negate it so that the filter matches all files that does not
have this filename. How to negate that regExp?

Note that if I invert the filter to return if the regExp doesn't match
it doesn't seem to work and writes everything to ARC

Thanks in advance
